sections: subscribers will talk to acclaimed writer, activist, and scholar Noam Chomsky about the rise of authoritarianism in America and his argument that Trumpism is an outgrowth of the Democrats abandoning the working class.
Chomsky has a new book out called
which chronicles his decades of protesting and what lessons can be learned in the current era.
These live chat events are exclusively for Daily Poster supporting subscribers, who are able to watch the broadcasts live and ask questions in real time.
Please register for the event ahead of time by using the link and password below in the login information section. And please start posting your questions in the chat room now!
DETAILS AND LOGIN INFO FOR 2/17 EVENT:
The live chat with Noam Chomsky will take place on Wednesday 2/17 at 7:00pm ET (4:00pm PST).
To participate, subscribers should go to this link: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/chomsky
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/chomsky
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
